Keywords: Deity , Eternal , Martial Artist , Past
Real Name: Kingo
Special Powers
LEGEND OF THE PAST: When an opposing character would move adjacent, you may roll a d6. 5-6: That character can't move into any squares adjacent to Kingo this turn.
THE DISCIPLINE OF THE BLADE: Blades/Claws/Fangs. FREE: Roll a d6 and place it on Kingo's card, replacing any there. // When Kingo rolls for a close attack or Blades/Claws/Fangs, you may remove the die from this card to replace a die in that roll.

Comments
December 8, 2021
Goop
I REALLY like this guy for only 50pts. You keep doing your free action till you get a high roll and that can be your attack OR your blades. Him having exploit at the top is huge for that. If you get a high dice roll you know you can hit hard, you even get to replace AFTER the roll. He also has great atk and defenses too. He's just awesome
